Interface FlightBookingManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
FlightBookingManagerImpl
public interface FlightBookingManager

A Booking Manager. The Manager knows about a particular collection of flights and allows bookings to be made for those flights. The manager can be queried to find out which airports it knows about, and can then be queried for flights between those airports. Bookings can be made on particular flights.
